item.description:
Join us for a fabulous fashion show at the elegant Center Court in Copley Place hosted by Lisa Donovan of Kiss 108's Matty in the Morning!

Enjoy complimentary Skinny Girl margaritas, Cameron Hughes wine, Hint Water, appetizers from Legal Seafoods, Cabot Cheese and Pretzel Crisps and cupcakes by Sweet M's Bake Shop.

Compete for the best-in-shoe title and win some great prizes during the famous pink carpet walk-off. Mingle with other shoe loving fashonistas, enjoy the tunes being spun by DJ Eric Moreira and take in a terrific show featuring shoe club members modeling fashions by:

Banana Republic
BCBG
Bebe
Cache
Elie Tahari
Karen Millen
Shoe Woo
Tumi

 Everyone receives a gift bag!

Not only will you have a fun night, but you will be helping 2 great charities serving children. Ticket proceeds will be donated to Project Smile, the non profit organization helping children who are victims of traumatic events and the Simon Youth Foundation.

This event will sell out, so get your tickets today!

Tickets are only $20 and can be purchased at:

http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e4ii3l8caf0f0cc7&llr=lzytkqcab
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in the event area at Center Court in Copley Place Mall. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Fall into Fashion Show, Copley Place. Free Cocktails and Apps.
